comment: Took CSE 3801 Professional Practices and Ethics. Very easy informative class. 5 assignments, 10 discussions, 2 team projects, and 2 exams + final. Exams are short answer but very easy. Everything else is a breeze just submit on time and very easy A.

The instructor's grading criteria was kind of all over the place the entire semester. There were projects with "example" papers and "required" elements that he would do a poor job at communicating and would end up doing work than necessary. That being said, the projects required were easy.The exams required retention of all assigned work.Fair class

Loved this teacher! His class was super simple, well taught. I loved that he incorporated a section about when you'd use the material (even gave good interview-related advice). I definitely recommend him.
Fantastic professor! Best course i've ever taken. He wants students to succeed.
Professor Duong Ho was absolutely amazing. He is very kind, understanding, and willing to help his students with anything. Do not hesitate to take a course with him.

Duong Ho is an absolutely amazing professor. He truly cares for each and every one of his students. The assignments, discussions, and tests were very understandable and clear. If anything was confusing, the professor was always willing to clarify things and even go as far as to make his own Youtube videos explaining the concepts. Truly Amazing!
He is AMAZING. He will help you with school and even future related stuff such as a resume. His lectures are very clear and to the point. I wish my professors were like him.

This is one of the best professors that I have had in a long time. Very thorough and willing to help ANY of his students. He's even willing to look over your resume to make sure you get a good job. He interviewed some people in the industry to give us a view of what to look for in this type of industry. Very quick to get back to you outside class.

Professor Duong is one of the best professors that I have ever had in my life. Actually, I can say that he is #1. He cares about his students, teaches them new skills, helps them in their resumes and replies to their concerns in details. I will definitely take him for any other class! He wants his students to succeed after college with no stress^^

I wish more professors were like him, he wants you to be successful and he updates students with what's going in the industry. He can also connect you to different employers. Definitely recommend Mr. Duong Ho.

Professor Ho is the best professor ever. Even though this was an on-line class, and it was his first time teaching, you can still feel as if he was always there with you. Super SUPER FAST response, provided very useful feedbacks, giving great tips of software engineering, and most of all, REAL LIFE interview of professionals in the field. What?!?!
